title: Melf
description: He’s Melf from the planet Melf and he’s crash landed in the family living room.
altHero: Melf, a purple furry alien wearing a backpack
alt1: the family sits on the couch watching tv as the father, Jeff, feeds Melf some popcorn
alt2: Jeff strokes Melf face at the dinner table
alt3: Melf and Jeff in a lawyer meeting
alt4: Melf and Toast, now all grown up, laughing together
